title: Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy
notes: Welcome screen appears and close immediately.

title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy™
notes:
Winedb rating: Silver. Game runs perfectly, but requires following workarounds:

1) Use following launch options:
NVIDIA proprietary drivers users:
__GL_ExtensionStringVersion=17700 %command%
AMD/Intel users might try: (not tested)
MESA_EXTENSION_MAX_YEAR=2003 %command%

2) Once in the game, there will be mouse glitch (seems to be wine issue), to work 
around it you need to change game resolution to native. If your resolution is
not listed, then follow any tutorial for changing resolution for 
id Tech 3 engine, e.g.: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=165867114

3) Mouse movement seems a bit laggy in menus,
but works fin in game. Using FHD resolution will stretch UI in menu.

Multiplayer was not tested.

title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy™
specs: Dell Inspiron 3537, i5, 8gb ram, 256gb ssd, Intel HD 4400 integrated graphics

title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy™
STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy™

systemInfoNotes: GTX 970 over noveau NV124, error on my End new to linux
title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy™

notes:
Add this to startup parameters:

__GL_ExtensionStringVersion=17700 %command%

Works well. Multiplayer with JA++ mod installed working -already played a few matches. Tested on Nvidia drivers. Issues with using alt-key; causes mouse click to not work in game, fixed by alt-tabbing out and in. Unsure why this is. Problem with Steam overlay; Mouse cursor invisible.
title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy™

notes: Needs launch parameters __GL_ExtensionStringVersion=17700 %command% After that, works flawlessly. Steam Overlay, mouse cursor, videos, music and sounds, all working just fine.
